Harpy.name: Black guardian
Harpy.description: A towering sixteen foot tall living statue of ebony synth flesh formed to perfection and carrying an immense halberd. Her body that of an alluring humanoid with a firm and shapely derrier, jutting blue capped breasts and the head of a jackal. The entire assemblage shifts smoothly and organically with her movements and only her rotating irises, glowing eyes and tight seams and joints mark her out as a product of artifice.
